attributes.action: Help stop the priminster from banning xl bully breed
attributes.additional_details: I feel its unfair  on the xl bully owners who take time and effort to  train their xl bully to be under control
attributes.background: Put tougher punishment and guidelines make training and understanding of the breed before buying them

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
